resources.string: The internet connection is not available, check the settings and try again.
Without permission IP location will be used.
Location services seem off, please check your settings.
This app requires Google Play Services to work properly.\nWithout it, you will not be able to use your live location.

To provide you with the most accurate weather forecasts we would need your approximate location.\nYou can always opt out and receive predictions based on your internet location.\nWe will not share anything with third parties.
